title: Balance? Nah, that's not important in a competitive game.
body:
Realistically, you have a pool of about 15 champions. Boast 100 and change champions is meaningless when the vast majority of them are significantly handicapped against champs like Yasuo, Zed, Rengar et cetera.

It's literally a case of: These champions get xteen different get out of jail free cards, and at least one instagib, the rest of you can go get fucked.

replies.body:
Look at worlds last year, 74 different champions used. Sure there were 4 with 90%+ pick/ban rate but still 74 different champions used in a worlds was pretty good.
It's mid season and theres the mage update coming soon, the meta will pan out and more champions will become "viable". At the end of the day almost every champion is viable it just depends on how much practice/effort you put into learning its role/matchups. A lot of older champs with outdated kits arent played as much and definitely do feel lack luster, but in time they will be reworked.
